comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Ella Hofer was a stage actress in New York City.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could it be the same person as in this photo(for sale and so it might disappear)? www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&cd=23&ved=... If so, she is categorized as an opera singer. The Ellis Island records show that an Ella Hofer arrived from Cuxhaven on the Imperator on April 9, 1914. www.ellisisland.org/search/FormatPassRec.asp?ID=100433050... The age given is 22. The woman here could be that young, but I'd have guessed she was older.
